Detailed Description

Class representing a creature's history.

As used in the C3 crypt as well as the creature's in-game info.

CreatureHistory::GetEvent ( $  n  ) 

Gets an event from the history.

Simply gets the nth event that happened in this history

Parameters:
$n the event number to get
Returns:
the $nth CreatureHistoryEvent

Definition at line 130 of file CreatureHistory.php.

CreatureHistory::GuessFormat (  ) 

Try to work out which game this CreatureHistory is for.

This is done by working out whether any DS-specific variables are set.

See also:
agents/PRAY/GLSTBlock.php History Formats
Returns:
GLST_FORMAT_DS or GLST_FORMAT_C3.

Definition at line 95 of file CreatureHistory.php.

CreatureHistory::SetC3Unknowns ( $  unknown1,
$  unknown2 
)

Set unknown variables.

Set variables that are currently unknown and used in C3 and DS These variables COULD be mutations and crossovers during conception, however in a creature that was not conceived, they appear to be strange.
Honestly, I don't know yet because I haven't managed to work it out.

Parameters:
$unknown1 First unknown variable
$unknown2 Second unknown variable

Definition at line 184 of file CreatureHistory.php.

CreatureHistory::SetDSUnknowns ( $  unknown1,
$  unknown2,
$  unknown3,
$  unknown4 
)

Set variables that are currently unknown, specific to DS.

This calls SetC3Unknown

Parameters:
$unknown1 First unknown variable (shared with C3)
$unknown2 Second unknown variable (shared with C3)
$unknown3 Third unknown variable (DS only)
$unknown4 Forth unknown variable (DS only)
